rComments: One of the worst experiences ever with a professor.  Not helpful, or personable. Takes a personal disliking to some unfortunate students. I was foolish enough to take 2 of her classes.  (What was I thinking?) I made an appointment with her and she forgot about me, leaving me to rot on the steps of the costume shop while she gabbed with 1 of her pet

Not clear, could teach sewing thoery okay but not practice. Made you do everything perfect so that was cool but she was rather mean and when you didn't get something she got annoyed instead of helping you. Good thing she's gone.

In my eval for her I wrote "NEVER TEACH AGAIN!"  At least not Intro to Design.  She sits on the edge of the stage and mumbles the book word for word.  She knows costumes and that's it.  Wait 'til the class is offered with Nick Nichols.
